description: This Java class 'MessageParam' defines an input or output parameter for a message in the IPC (Inter-Process Communication) framework within the project. It manages the parameter's type, name, and native C declaration generation based on configuration.

classes.name: MessageParam
classes.description: Represents a parameter for a message (either input or output) in the IPC system, encapsulating type, name, and associated logic for native code declaration.

methods.name: MessageParam
methods.description: Constructor that initializes a MessageParam object based on an ICMessageParm bean, determining the type of parameter.

methods.name: getField
methods.description: Returns the BaseVariable representing the parameter's type.

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the name of the parameter.

methods.name: setName
methods.description: Sets the name of the parameter.

methods.name: getNativeDeclaration
methods.description: Generates the C-native declaration string for this parameter based on context and usage (e.g., malloc).
